document_data.name: Hestroone Sturnshon
document_data.children: [[Braetha Sturnshon]], [[Charethra Sturnshon]], [[Kalaeria Sturnshon]], and five more sisters
document_data.mainbody: '''Hestroone Sturnshon''' was the brat among the daughters of [[Hlargrim Sturnshon]], who along with her eight sisters worked at the [[Dryad's Dreams]], the only festhall in [[Mosstone]], [[Tethyr]], in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Like her sisters, Hestroone had long silky brown hair, akin to the color of [[ivory]], and large cheerful dark eyes. She wore the Dryad's uniform: a sewn green-dyed [[leather]] gown resembling that of an actual [[dryad]], which was a dress made out of leaves.
document_data.History: Hestroone, [[Braetha Sturnshon|Braetha]], [[Charethra Sturnshon|Charethra]], [[Kalaeria Sturnshon|Kalaeria]], and her five other sisters all worked at the Dryad's Dreams with their father. The women were in charge of serving food and drinks to the customers and entertained them, giving rubdowns to sore muscles of foresters and rangers at the end of a long workday. The women greeted the clients with cheery attitudes and affectionate body language. On occasion, they performed a limited assortment of medical procedures, such as setting dislocated joints or fingers for the locals.
